enterSystem.title: Entering the system
enterSystem.guidance: Specify your ID with the @ prefix to log into the pre-created account Or to create a new account,just enter your NAME without any prefix
enterSystem.checkBoxMessage: In local mode, you can use the application offline and your data will be saved in the device itself,and if you change the device, the previous data will be lost.

signUp.message1: I am glad that you have decided to take a step to manage your work.
signUp.message2: To create an account, please enter the requested information.
